title: Ph.D. Shortlisted Candidates for Written Test - Jan-June 2025
purpose: Provisionally shortlisted candidates for online written test and/or interview for Ph.D. admission (Jan-June 2025 session)
instructions: All other contents in the memo F.No.5.(6-Acad)/Ph.D /Admn/2025/Jan/1855 dated 13/12/2024 remain unchanged.
copy_to: PS to the Director, NIT Agartala, for kind information of the Director
